markdownRemark.excerpt: This is a reference post that lists Gutenberg script versions that are shipped with WordPress core v5.6. If you are using the  package to build your plugin…
markdownRemark.html:
This is a reference post that lists Gutenberg script versions that are shipped with WordPress core v5.6. If you are using the @wordpress/scripts package to build your plugin scripts, make sure to install these versions to have the same scripts and API’s available as will be in the WordPress backend.

Package Version
a11y 2.13.0
api-fetch 3.20.0
blob 2.11.0
block-editor 5.1.4
blocks 6.24.2
components 11.1.3
compose 3.22.0
data 4.25.0
date 3.12.0
dom-ready 2.11.0
edit-post 3.25.5
editor 9.24.4
element 2.18.0
html-entities 2.9.0
i18n 3.16.0
icons 2.8.0
keycodes 2.16.0
rich-text 3.23.0
scripts 12.4.0
url 2.19.0
viewport 2.24.0
lodash 4.17.19

The full list is available here.

This page lists the Gutenberg versions contained in each core release.
